reviews.review: A fantastic thrill ride that’ll have you screaming for more...literally! Infinity War is the culmination of 10 years of Marvel cinema magic, and they’re just getting started. With the biggest cast of superheroes to date, Infinity War pits the Avengers against their most dangerous and deadly opponent, Thanos the Mad Titan. Believe me when I say, they’ll be taking about this ending for years!

Best marvel movie so far. Best avengers so far. Scene continuity was good even though they had to cover a lot of different "teams" of heroes. Well paced and lots of solid comedy. Cliffhangers but satisfying as well.
No spoilers; I thought it was great actually really well balanced, probably slightly better than a 4 star.
Love this movie so much. Especially because Captain America is alive ??. Can't wait for part 2.

10 years of well crafted film with so much heart and would paid off in the incredible epic, Avengers Infinity War.
A true triumph for the Russo Brothers who outdid themselves once again.They managed to give each and every character (out of 30! THATS CRAZY) a decent moment to shine, moments that made me jump out of my seat, exclaim in awe, or crack me up for 3 minutes straight! Thor, Gamora, Scarlet Witch, Ironman, Spiderman, Star Lord, Vision were my highlights from the group of heroes. But boy oh boy, what really impressed me was THANOS.
Holy cow! Flat out saying this, he's probably my favourite on screen villain of all time. He destroys the avengers into mush, eats them, chews them up, spits them out and then proceeds to destroy them further. He brings the ruthlessness and fear factor, while also having immense depth, extremely solid motivation and oh so much emotion! ?? Halfway through the film Thanos was faced with a challenge, I don't want to spoil anything for anyone but my lord Josh Broling knocked that scene out of the park! The scariest villains are the ones who think they're doing the right thing. We can definitely add Thanos to that list. 
The Score/Soundtrack was incredible, the use of music was super well done, Loved the hints of character themes as well as Thano's main theme. 
I've got nothing but praise for this film, goes by with a blisteringly fast pace. It's most incredible feat is probably how it manages to ride a perfectly balanced line with its funny, yet dark tone. One minute it had me laughing, the next minute scared for my life, the next cheering because of the crazy good action and the next making me sit there and weep.
I don't need to tell anyone to go out there and watch this, in theathres, as soon as possible, because I know everyone's butts are going to be in the seats. This is an event, just like star wars back in the 70's. 
I'm going to look back at this 20 years from now and still remember how I felt watching this, sitting in my seat, chills down my spine, just having a heck of a time. 
Also, THAT ENDING. Even after 3 viewing... I can't fathom nothing. CRAZY. #thanosdemandsyoursilence #10yearsofgreatness

"Avengers: Infinity War" is an epic, thrilling, and emotionally heavy film that manages to live up to its large premise. Its decision to tackle a large amount of storylines is more ambitious than previous Marvel films have been, but it manages to work into an engaging and satisfying film.
I can't believe how well they were able to balance this many characters, nothing like this has ever been done before.
it was good. Better in 3D. It was really long. The ending was weird.
This movies proves Marvel have perfected the formula of bring comic books or superhero animated to live action.
Epic and outstanding. The most awesome marvel movies and any super heroes movie. Brilliant!!!
